name: Clairvoyance
description:
Clairvoyance is my entry in the 2021 Global Game Jam. In this game, you play as a robot whose eye has been stolen by other robots. You must hack into their eyes and cameras to find your body, and guide it to recover your eye and escape their compound.

Programming and Design by Spencer Rawls (me!)

Sound Design by James Mello - https://www.jamesrmello.com/

Music by Patrick Allred - https://patrickallred.com
